New Records: Bowden Francis tied for the fewest hits allowed in a 9-start span, matching Santana (Jun-Aug 2004), Verlander (Apr-May 2019), and Woodruff (Apr-May 2021) with 24 hits allowed over 60 innings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Toronto Blue Jays lost to the Texas Rangers 2-0 on September 19, 2024, with Bowden Francis pitching 6.0 innings and giving up two earned runs.
